FindingName: Self-Service Password Reset is Not Enabled
Description: Microsoft 365's Self-Service Password Reset feature enables users to reset their own password. It is recommended to allow users to reset their own passwords for the purpose of recovering their account in the event of accidental lockout or a security incident.
Remediation: This setting can be changed in the O365 Administration center, under Settings → Org Settings → Security & Privacy. A detailed guide is provided in the references section below.

References.Text: Let users reset their own passwords
